Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner

Review Text: We were nicely greeted and welcomed by a staff named Chris and he made sure we were always taken care of at the table. The atmosphere of the restaurant is cosy and we really enjoyed the dishes we had. We will definitely come back.

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner
Review Text: Overall good experience, however, we waited 20 mins to be seated (even though we had a reservation) then were seated in a hallway table which seemed to be added. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner
Review Text: The worst experience ever. We didn't know where to go and the host didn't bother to help us out, then we had to wait 30 minutes before receiving our table after chasing them down to give us a proper table because we had made a reservation, but the shocking thing is that none of them were remorseful; like they were doing us a favor.

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner

Name: Lotti‚Äôs Dinner
